    LS_alpine

    LS_alpine.Rmd
    library(Rsagacmd)
library(terra)
#> terra 1.5.21
library(rusleR)

# initiate a saga object
saga <- saga_gis(raster_backend = "terra")

# load DEM
f <- system.file("extdata/dem.tif", package="rusleR")
DEM <- rast(f)

# calculate LS-alpine
ls <- ls_alpine(dem = DEM)
#> Warning: Missing BASEGEODCRS / BASEGEOGCRS / GEOGCS node (GDAL error 1)
